gtsoft.ivory.server.jca.cci
Class IvoryStringRecord

java.lang.Object
  gtsoft.ivory.server.jca.cci.IvoryBaseRecord
      gtsoft.ivory.server.jca.cci.IvoryStringRecord
All Implemented Interfaces:
IvoryRecord, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, javax.resource.cci.Record, javax.resource.cci.Streamable
public class IvoryStringRecord
extends IvoryBaseRecord

This class is used for exchanging request and response data with the Ivory resource adapter. It holds a String which could respresent XML or JSON.

See Also:

Get the byte array of the request or response. The String contained within this object is transformed into a byte array using the charset provided, default charset = UTF-8.
